genresAdvancedInfo.name: metalcore espanol
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Metalcore espanol is a subgenre of metalcore that originated in Spain. It incorporates elements of traditional Spanish music and culture into its sound. The lyrics are often sung in Spanish and explore themes of identity, politics, and social issues affecting the country. The genre has a growing following in Spain and Latin America.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify
